ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.1.1 on 2024-03-13T17:02:00 [Issue ID 4000-107818] urn:comicvine:4000-107818 Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-16 03:27:01. [Issue ID 327330]
ComicInfo.Summary: Backlash invades Stonewall Federal Armory to rescue the captured Taboo. Dingo helps him out as the Chasers stand in his way. After Taboo is liberated, however, she is unaware that Backlash is newly single and decides to go her own way rather than compete for his affections. An emotionally weary Backlash returns home only to discover a daughter he never knew he had waiting on his arrival.
ComicInfo.Writer: Brett Booth,Jeff Mariotte,Sean Ruffner,Sean Ruffner,Jeff Mariotte,Brett Booth
